00032         template <typename T, precision P>
00033         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER GLM_CONSTEXPR length_t tmat2x4<T, P>::length() const
00034         {
00035                 return 2;
00036         }

00043         tmat2x4<T, P>::operator[]
00044         (

00066         template <typename T, precision P>
00067         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x4<T, P>::tmat2x4()
00068         {
00069                 value_type const Zero(0);
00070                 value_type const One(1);
00071                 this->value[0] = col_type(One, Zero, Zero, Zero);
00072                 this->value[1] = col_type(Zero, One, Zero, Zero);
00073         }
00074 
00075         template <typename T, precision P>
00076         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x4<T, P>::tmat2x4
00077         (
00078                 tmat2x4<T, P> const & m
00079         )
00080         {
00081                 this->value[0] = m.value[0];
00082                 this->value[1] = m.value[1];
00083         }

00101         template <typename T, precision P>
00102         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x4<T, P>::tmat2x4
00103         (
00104                 T const & s
00105         )
00106         {
00107                 value_type const Zero(0);
00108                 this->value[0] = col_type(s, Zero, Zero, Zero);
00109                 this->value[1] = col_type(Zero, s, Zero, Zero);
00110         }
00111 
00112         template <typename T, precision P>
00113         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x4<T, P>::tmat2x4
00114         (
00115                 T const & x0, T const & y0, T const & z0, T const & w0,
00116                 T const & x1, T const & y1, T const & z1, T const & w1
00117         )
00118         {
00119                 this->value[0] = col_type(x0, y0, z0, w0);
00120                 this->value[1] = col_type(x1, y1, z1, w1);
00121         }
00122 
00123         template <typename T, precision P>
00124         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x4<T, P>::tmat2x4
00125         (
00126                 col_type const & v0,
00127                 col_type const & v1
00128         )
00129         {
00130                 this->value[0] = v0;
00131                 this->value[1] = v1;
00132         }

00135         // Conversion constructors
00136         template <typename T, precision P>
00137         template <
00138                 typename X1, typename Y1, typename Z1, typename W1,
00139                 typename X2, typename Y2, typename Z2, typename W2>
00140         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x4<T, P>::tmat2x4
00141         (
00142                 X1 const & x1, Y1 const & y1, Z1 const & z1, W1 const & w1,
00143                 X2 const & x2, Y2 const & y2, Z2 const & z2, W2 const & w2
00144         )
00145         {
00146                 this->value[0] = col_type(static_cast<T>(x1), value_type(y1), value_type(z1), value_type(w1));
00147                 this->value[1] = col_type(static_cast<T>(x2), value_type(y2), value_type(z2), value_type(w2));
00148         }
00149         
00150         template <typename T, precision P>
00151         template <typename V1, typename V2>
00152         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x4<T, P>::tmat2x4
00153         (
00154                 tvec4<V1, P> const & v1,
00155                 tvec4<V2, P> const & v2
00156         )
00157         {
00158                 this->value[0] = col_type(v1);
00159                 this->value[1] = col_type(v2);
00160         }

00365         template <typename T, precision P>
00366         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x4<T, P> operator+
00367         (
00368                 tmat2x4<T, P> const & m,
00369                 T const & s
00370         )
00371         {

00373                         m[0] + s,

00437         template <typename T, precision P>
00438         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat2x4<T, P>::col_type operator* 
00439         (
00440                 tmat2x4<T, P> const & m, 
00441                 typename tmat2x4<T, P>::row_type const & v
00442         )
00443         {
00444                 return typename tmat2x4<T, P>::col_type(
00445                         m[0][0] * v.x + m[1][0] * v.y,
00446                         m[0][1] * v.x + m[1][1] * v.y,
00447                         m[0][2] * v.x + m[1][2] * v.y,
00448                         m[0][3] * v.x + m[1][3] * v.y);
00449         }
00450 
00451         template <typename T, precision P>
00452         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat2x4<T, P>::row_type operator*
00453         (
00454                 typename tmat2x4<T, P>::col_type const & v,
00455                 tmat2x4<T, P> const & m
00456         )
00457         {
00458                 return typename tmat2x4<T, P>::row_type(
00459                         v.x * m[0][0] + v.y * m[0][1] + v.z * m[0][2] + v.w * m[0][3],
00460                         v.x * m[1][0] + v.y * m[1][1] + v.z * m[1][2] + v.w * m[1][3]);
00461         }
00462 
00463         template <typename T, precision P>
00464         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat4x4<T, P> operator*
00465         (
00466                 tmat2x4<T, P> const & m1,
00467                 tmat4x2<T, P> const & m2
00468         )
00469         {
00470                 T SrcA00 = m1[0][0];
00471                 T SrcA01 = m1[0][1];
00472                 T SrcA02 = m1[0][2];
00473                 T SrcA03 = m1[0][3];
00474                 T SrcA10 = m1[1][0];
00475                 T SrcA11 = m1[1][1];
00476                 T SrcA12 = m1[1][2];
00477                 T SrcA13 = m1[1][3];
00478 
00479                 T SrcB00 = m2[0][0];
00480                 T SrcB01 = m2[0][1];
00481                 T SrcB10 = m2[1][0];
00482                 T SrcB11 = m2[1][1];
00483                 T SrcB20 = m2[2][0];
00484                 T SrcB21 = m2[2][1];
00485                 T SrcB30 = m2[3][0];
00486                 T SrcB31 = m2[3][1];
00487 
00488                 tmat4x4<T, P> Result(tmat4x4<T, P>::_null);
00489                 Result[0][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB00 + SrcA10 * SrcB01;
00490                 Result[0][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB00 + SrcA11 * SrcB01;
00491                 Result[0][2] = SrcA02 * SrcB00 + SrcA12 * SrcB01;
00492                 Result[0][3] = SrcA03 * SrcB00 + SrcA13 * SrcB01;
00493                 Result[1][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB10 + SrcA10 * SrcB11;
00494                 Result[1][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB10 + SrcA11 * SrcB11;
00495                 Result[1][2] = SrcA02 * SrcB10 + SrcA12 * SrcB11;
00496                 Result[1][3] = SrcA03 * SrcB10 + SrcA13 * SrcB11;
00497                 Result[2][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB20 + SrcA10 * SrcB21;
00498                 Result[2][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB20 + SrcA11 * SrcB21;
00499                 Result[2][2] = SrcA02 * SrcB20 + SrcA12 * SrcB21;
00500                 Result[2][3] = SrcA03 * SrcB20 + SrcA13 * SrcB21;
00501                 Result[3][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB30 + SrcA10 * SrcB31;
00502                 Result[3][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB30 + SrcA11 * SrcB31;
00503                 Result[3][2] = SrcA02 * SrcB30 + SrcA12 * SrcB31;
00504                 Result[3][3] = SrcA03 * SrcB30 + SrcA13 * SrcB31;
00505                 return Result;
00506         }
00507 
00508         template <typename T, precision P>
00509         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x4<T, P> operator*
00510         (
00511                 tmat2x4<T, P> const & m1,
00512                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m2
00513         )
00514         {
00515                 return tmat2x4<T, P>(
00516                         m1[0][0] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[0][1],
00517                         m1[0][1] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[0][1],
00518                         m1[0][2] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[0][1],
00519                         m1[0][3] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][3] * m2[0][1],
00520                         m1[0][0] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[1][1],
00521                         m1[0][1] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[1][1],
00522                         m1[0][2] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[1][1],
00523                         m1[0][3] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][3] * m2[1][1]);
00524         }
00525 
00526         template <typename T, precision P>
00527         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x4<T, P> operator*
00528         (
00529                 tmat2x4<T, P> const & m1,
00530                 tmat3x2<T, P> const & m2
00531         )
00532         {
00533                 return tmat3x4<T, P>(
00534                         m1[0][0] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[0][1],
00535                         m1[0][1] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[0][1],
00536                         m1[0][2] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[0][1],
00537                         m1[0][3] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][3] * m2[0][1],
00538                         m1[0][0] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[1][1],
00539                         m1[0][1] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[1][1],
00540                         m1[0][2] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[1][1],
00541                         m1[0][3] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][3] * m2[1][1],
00542                         m1[0][0] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[2][1],
00543                         m1[0][1] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[2][1],
00544                         m1[0][2] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[2][1],
00545                         m1[0][3] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][3] * m2[2][1]);
00546         }

00574         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x4<T, P> const operator-

00582         }
00583 
00585         // Boolean operators
00586 
00587         template <typename T, precision P>
00588         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool operator==
00589         (
00590                 tmat2x4<T, P> const & m1,
00591                 tmat2x4<T, P> const & m2
00592         )
00593         {
00594                 return (m1[0] == m2[0]) && (m1[1] == m2[1]);
00595         }
00596 
00597         template <typename T, precision P>
00598         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool operator!=
00599         (
00600                 tmat2x4<T, P> const & m1,
00601                 tmat2x4<T, P> const & m2
00602         )
00603         {
00604                 return (m1[0] != m2[0]) || (m1[1] != m2[1]);
00605         }
00606 } //namespace detail
00607 } //namespace glm
